name: Material Design System
description:
My goal is to provide a template of an atomic design library to help anyone who has a hard time starting from scratch and want to build their own atomic design system.


All elements of this library use auto layout and are based on Google's material design system.


Any comments, questions or needs you might have, let me know so I can make this library better for everyone!


If you need help with creating a custom design system for your team, let me know how I might help you.


Current Version 1.03

  • Animated Progress Indicators


Version 1.02

  • Cards moved to a page named "Cards"


Version 1.01

  • System Icon element was moved under Buttons
  • System Icon element renamed to Interactive Icon
